author: Gerry Moriarty
title: Coronavirus: Northern Ireland movement restrictions extended until May
description: Number of confirmed cases rises above 2,000 with 140 deaths, Public Health Agency says
content:
Restrictions on peoples movement introduced in Northern Ireland in reponse to the coronavirus pandemic will remain in place until at least May, Stormonts health minister has said. 
Robin Swann said only essential travel is permitted and people are urged to r… [+1297 chars]
